doc:
Robert B. Williams (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_B._Williams_(actor) 0 Robert B. Williams (September 23, 1904 – June 17, 1978), also known simply as Robert Williams, was an American character actor from the 1940s through the 1970s. During his 37-year career, he appeared in over 150 feature films, as well as numerous film shorts, television films, and television shows. He did not break into the film business until he was in his 30s. Robert_B._Williams ( September_23_,_1904 – June_17_,_1978 ) , also_known simply as Robert_Williams , was an_American_character_actor from the_1940s through the_1970s . During his_37-year_career , he appeared in over_150_feature_films , as_well_as numerous_film_shorts , television_films , and television_shows . He did_not_break into the_film_business until he was in his_30s .
